name: Runway (RunwayML)
description: Runway is a web-based creative suite powered by AI, best known for its pioneering work in AI video generation. It offers a wide range of tools for creators working with video, images, and audio.
features: AI Video Generation (Text-to-Video, Image-to-Video, Video-to-Video - Gen-1, Gen-2)
AI Magic Tools for Video Editing (Background Removal, Object Removal, Slow Motion, Motion Tracking)
AI Magic Tools for Image Editing (Infinite Image/Outpainting, Background Removal, Erase/Replace)

pricing.free_tier: Limited credits, projects, lower export resolutions, watermarks.

paid_tiers.name: Standard
paid_tiers.description: Increased monthly credits, higher resolution exports, more storage.

paid_tiers.name: Pro
paid_tiers.description: More credits, higher limits, watermark removal, access to advanced features.

pricing.notes: Credits consumed for generation and specific AI tools. Video generation is credit-intensive.

pros: Leader and innovator in AI video generation
Comprehensive suite of AI creative tools
Accessible via web and mobile app (iOS)
cons: Video generation is credit-intensive and can be costly
AI video quality may still show artifacts/inconsistencies
Free tier is very limited for practical work
Sheer number of features can be overwhelming

technical_specifications.api_type: Not prominently featured for public use (potentially enterprise)

performance_metrics.latency: Varies by task and server load
performance_metrics.accuracy: High potential quality, depends on input/settings

security_compliance.data_protection: Governed by standard Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
